description:
Download and play crossword puzzles right on your webOS phone or your TouchPad! Each day many newspapers provide their crossword puzzles online; with one tap you can download and solve them, get hints, view clues, and track how quickly you're improving!

* New puzzles every day
* One tap downloads all of today's puzzles
* Nearly unlimited puzzles from many different sites
* US, UK, and Australian puzzles available
* Quickly see your recently played, or sort by date or provider
* Detailed info on each puzzle
* Post your solve times online and compare with other solvers
* Grab older puzzles with a tap
* Optimized for both webOS phones and tablets
versionNote: This version fixes a clue truncation bug and corrects the on-screen skip key behavior.
